mainInitialize

Class GameStats

  • java.lang.Object
    • mainInitialize.GameStats

  • public class GameStats
extends java.lang.Object
    Gamestats is a class that represents a global overview on the game's statistics as well containing information about every object on the map.
    Author:
    Peter
